channel.title: HELP WITH CLIENT! I Know im in the wrong section but no one will help me!
channel.description: I have my client the ip is set to 127.0.0.1 and when i change it to my no-ip IP it wont let me on. Every thing is portforwarded right

item.title: HELP WITH CLIENT! I Know im in the wrong section but no one will help me!
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:13, topic:427182”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=529879.msg3868222#msg3868222 date=1325141726]
I wouldn’t say I can code. I know how to program okay though.Not nearly as good as people give me credits for :rolleyes:
[/quote]
Point is that you don’t have to make stupid threads like this. We should seriously stop helping people like this who have absolutely no prior knowledge on how to fix the MOST BASIC OF JAVA ERRORS IN EXISTENCE. I would actually be willing to make a detailed, hour-long, HD video explaining some of this shit to people.[/quote]

^^

Read full topic

Loveandpower:

I wouldn’t say I can code. I know how to program okay though.Not nearly as good as people give me credits for :rolleyes:

Point is that you don’t have to make stupid threads like this. We should seriously stop helping people like this who have absolutely no prior knowledge on how to fix the MOST BASIC OF JAVA ERRORS IN EXISTENCE. I would actually be willing to make a detailed, hour-long, HD video explaining some of this shit to people.

  1. People love you
  2. You can actually code[/quote]You have to show love to get love

item.title: HELP WITH CLIENT! I Know im in the wrong section but no one will help me!
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Oh my, where to start?

  1. I’ll restate that question
Pzezima2:

If you know you’re posting in the wrong section why did you do it?

  1. If you don’t post in the right section, no one will help
  2. It takes more than 30 seconds to get help
RedaBle:

cause im asking for help ass hole

Insulting people for absolutely no reason at all won’t help your reputation, it will only make people hate you. All he did was ask a question and you call him an asshole. People like you really don’t deserve help in my own opinion. I suggest you get off this site before you’re hated.

tl;dr: Fuck you

Read full topic
